name: Poki
desc: Play thousands of free online games directly in your browser. No downloads, no login necessary. Enjoy categories like Action, Racing, Puzzle and more!

name: Instagram
desc: Connect with friends, share what you're up to, or see what's new from others all over the world. Explore our community where you can feel free to be yourself.

name: Snake.io
desc: Slither through a new competitive version of Snake and survive as long as you can! Challenge your friends and try to be the biggest worm in the arena.
